trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> namespace provides classes that allow you to write custom installers for your own components.
trans-unit.target: El espacio de nombres <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> proporciona clases que permiten escribir instaladores personalizados para componentes propios.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> class is the base class for all custom installers in the.NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> es la clase base para todos los instaladores personalizados de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property, an installer contains a collection of other installers as children.
trans-unit.target: A través de la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propiedad, un instalador contiene una colección de otros instaladores como elementos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: As the installer is executed, it cycles through its children and calls <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se ejecuta el instalador, éste recorre sus elementos secundarios y llamadas <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an object in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de un objeto en el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> colección, consulte <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property contains information about the installation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propiedad contiene información sobre la instalación.

trans-unit.source: For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file that saves information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, información sobre la ubicación del archivo de registro para la instalación, la ubicación del archivo que guarda la información que necesita la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método y la línea de comandos que se especificó cuando se ejecutó el ejecutable de instalación.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an installation executable, see [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de un ejecutable de instalación, consulte [Installutil.exe (herramienta Installer)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods are not always called on the same instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, y <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos no siempre se llama en la misma instancia de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might use an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> to install and commit an application, and then release the reference to that <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, podría usar un <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> para instalar y confirmar una aplicación y, a continuación, suelte la referencia a dicha <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: Later, uninstalling the application creates a new reference to an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, which means that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method is called on a different instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Más adelante, al desinstalar la aplicación crea una nueva referencia a un <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, lo que significa que la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método se llama en una instancia diferente de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, do not save the state of a computer in an installer.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, no guarde el estado de un equipo en un instalador.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that is preserved across calls and passed into the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, use un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> que se conserva en las llamadas y pasa el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, y <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos.
